alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 10:07AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west to northwest winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust expected. * WHERE...Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and perhaps a wall of dust is expected reducing visibilities and making travel hazardous if not dangerous at times.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
